posts.title: Calculating Pi
posts.text: Calculating pie Well there is a really easy way to calculate Ï€ using C++(or any other programming language actuallyâ€¦) And here is a simple programme used to calculate Ï€ ðŸ˜ƒ 12345678int main(){ double pie = 1.0; for(int i = 2; i < 1000000; i++) pie = pie+(-1+2*(i%2))*(1/static_cast<double>(2*i-1)); cout << "pi: " << pie * 4 << endl; return 0;}

posts.title: Insertion Sort
posts.text: Insertion Sort Well this article is for testing codes ðŸ˜ƒ Here is the code: 123456789101112131415void sort(int arr[], int len){ int key, j; for (int i = 1; i < len; i++) { key = arr[i]; j = i - 1; while ((j > -1) && (arr[j] > key) ) { arr[j+1] = arr[j]; j--; } arr[j+1] = key; }}

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick Start Create a new post 1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server 1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files 1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites 1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
